Name: Angel Face
Description: Shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Agitar bien y colar en una copa de cóctel.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 잘 흔든 다음, 칵테일 글라스에 담아주세요.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Gut schütteln und in ein Cocktailglass gießen
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Agite bem e sirva em um copo de coquetel.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Хорошо встряхните и процедите в бокал для коктейля.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: İyi çalkala ve bir kokteyl bardağına dök
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 天使之颜。摇匀，然后倒入鸡尾酒杯。
